      • getItemsString

        public java.lang.String getItemsString​(int index)
        Get items of the specified date in string format. The date is specified as a number between 0 to 6. 6 is the latest.
        Parameters:
        index - index of specific date
        Returns:
        items posted in the specific date in string format

      • getItemsbyDateString

        public java.lang.String getItemsbyDateString​(java.lang.String date)
        Get items of the specified date in string format.
        Parameters:
        date - specific date to retrieve data
        Returns:
        items posted in the specific date in string format
